# JsPHP 开发前准备

# Composer包管理工具

  • 阿里云 Composer 全量镜像 https://developer.aliyun.com/composer (opens new window)

# 淘宝 NPM 镜像

npm install -g cnpm --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org

# Git包管理工具

  • Git for Windows v2.24.0 (2019-11-06 19:46) https://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/git-for-windows/v2.24.0.windows.2/ (opens new window)

# Yarn for windows

  • yarn for Windows (2019-10-08 11:39) https://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/yarn/v1.19.2/ (opens new window)

# NodeJs

  • node for node-v13.1.0 (05-Nov-2019 16:54) https://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/node/v13.2.0/ (opens new window)

# 代码编辑器工具

  • HBuilderX https://www.dcloud.io/docs/HBuilder.json (opens new window)
  • HBuilder.9.1.29.windows https://download.dcloud.net.cn/HBuilder.9.1.29.windows.zip (opens new window)
